creditline: Gift of Frederick T. and Margaret M. Boehm
description: exterior scene of a building with red walls, a black and gray roof, a red banner with Japanese script, and red and white hanging lanterns flanking the open door; inside, two seated gray figures are just visible; a gray path runs along the foreground with a black structure outside the door, and the corner of another building on the R; green trees visible in background
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Print (sōsaku hanga)
